resources.string: This transaction was rejected by a full node. It is probably stale (already used by someone else), however its also possible that the transaction was never valid, or that it is fine and the nodes we asked are dishonest. The wallet will ignore this transaction unless it gets confirmed.
You must enable the %perm permission to use this feature. You may do so in Android Settings -> Apps -> Wally -> Permissions
Delete blockchain state and search anew for all transactions relevant to the wallet

Warning: you have not written down the secret recovery phrases for some accounts! To ensure funds are not lost if this device is lost or broken, write the secret recovery keys down on paper or other non-electronic format.

Rediscovering an account will zero the wallet and search the blockchain for payments, as if the account is being newly created. This process can take a long time. However, a "fast forward" button may appear that gives you the option to ask a database for your wallet activity. If the date above is incorrect, wait for a few seconds for it to be updated.

This function searches the blockchain for missing payments. This process can take a long time. However, a "fast forward" button may appear that gives you the option to ask a database for your wallet activity.

Rediscovering a blockchain will delete all blockchain header data from this wallet and re-download it from full nodes. This process can take a long time. Only use if you are sure that there is a blockchain header problem.

Deleting an account will make all balances, identities, and history unavailable unless the account is recovered via the account recovery secret phrase! Only do this if you are ABSOLUTELY SURE!\n\nDelete account "%accountName" (on %blockchain)?

This operation will check the blockchain for recent transactions you have sent. Based on their presence or absence, it will either confirm or erase them. If transactions are erased, the money will seem to disappear. You will need to "rediscover" to regain the spent balance. Do not use if you have recently issued a transaction, since that transaction may be latent in the network, waiting for confirmation.

This 12 word phrase can be used to restore your wallet if your phone is damaged or lost. This means that whoever possesses this phrase can spend your money. Write it down in pen on paper (or etch it into steel) and store it securely!

Copied to clipboard. However, copying and pasting this recovery phrase into any app is a BAD IDEA! Email, most apps, backup services, etc. are not truly secure in a manner needed to hold a phrase that is literally money.
Your primary account is the account that is used for your identity and to make automatic payments. It also is the first account shown in various places in this app. It must be on the Nexa blockchain.
You pay the bill (in fiat), then your friends pay you their portion via the QR code below. Include yourself in the count of ways to split, unless your friends are buying!
Try taking a picture from farther away if you took a close up of the QR code. The white border is part of the QR code, and you can get confusing moire patterns if photographing a screen up close.
No assets currently available in your account.
rounded up, press send again to accept
Account currency is %walletCrypto, address is %addressCrypto. Use the combo box to change the send from account to one that matches the address\'s blockchain.
Too many decimal places -- this currency does not divide that finely
Turn on to keep your identity here separate from other sites.

Selecting this option will provide your social media information (as configured in settings) to this web site, if requested
Selecting this option will provide your address (as configured in settings) to this web site, if requested
Selecting this option will provide your billing address (as configured in settings) to this web site, if requested
Selecting this option will give your real name (as configured in settings) to this web site
Attestations are 3rd party signatures that confirm the data you supply
A %primCurrency account is needed to use this feature
Some features are linked to certain cryptocurrencies. You must create or unlock an account on that cryptocurrency before using the feature.

The currently selected account \'%act\' HAS NOT yet registered with this service.
Enter as list of service:handle, E.g. twitter:janeDoe, keybase:janieD

Entering this information is optional and will only be provided to services that you choose. The purpose is to allow common fields in forms to be filled by simply scanning a QR code in identity-enabled web sites.

Spending without a PIN is enabled (no PIN entered)

You are creating an account with a specific recovery phrase, but no activity was found on the blockchain.\nIs this right?\nIf so, go ahead and click the create button again and an empty account will be created. But if this account should have activity, double check your selected blockchain and recovery phrase. If that is not the problem, either the blockchain network is currently inaccessible (try again later), or it was created with an nonstandard wallet app. Do not create this account now.
fee exceeds configured maximum allowed flat fee
no unlocked account exists for this currency or blockchain
You selected to pay from an account containing %cryptoAct but %cryptoPay is needed
The calling program supplied badly formatted number when providing the quantity to send. You will need to enter the quantity yourself
A new receive address is in the process of being calculated. Please wait...
Either no existing account matches this blockchain, or the account has not been unlocked.

You are attempting to send more coins than you have available right now.

If you think you are not spending more than your balance, you may have forgotten that transactions have a small additional fee, or if you see all of your balance as unconfirmed you may have made too many transactions in a row.

There is a limit to how far you can "get ahead" of the blockchain. Let your unconfirmed balance confirm and try again.
You are attempting to send more tokens than you have available right now.
Deducted fee is larger than the amount being sent
Incorrect wallet implementation. Report this bug!
CAUTION: The items on this page are links to 3rd party services and web sites, placed here for your convenience. These sites/services have not been vetted by Wally Wallet.\n\nUse at your own risk!
NiftyArt.cash: Create and trade unique images and digital representations of unique items

Information about %num assets that you own will be provided to this service.
Accepting this request simply gives the service information about your ownership. It does not authorize any transfers.
%tokReveal token types are revealed (spent to yourself, proving you own them).
This request has no effect on this account.
This content belongs to the owner of the asset
Online restaurant ordering services (for delivery or pickup) may accept cryptocurrency even if the physical location does not.
Find locations near you that accept cryptocurrency.
txbit.io: Exchange NEXA for other cryptocurrencies

Welcome to Wally, a cryptocurrency wallet!

On the following screens, you will set up your first Nexa blockchain account (NEX) and configure other services like password management.

Or you can press the back arrow to skip this guided setup.

On the next page, you will set up your first Nexa account.

This account contains your Nexa money and your identities. Identities are a new feature of the Wally Wallet, which allows you to automatically log in to supported websites.

You can choose to protect your accounts with a Personal Identification Number (PIN), however, we recommend new users not to use a PIN (and keep a low balance) for their first account. For user protection, accounts protected by PINs are not visible until the correct PIN has been entered (it is not indicated if a wrong PIN has been entered).

If you want to restore an existing NEXA account, provide the recovery phrase. If this line remains empty, a new account is created.
Welcome 3 ! (This welcome text can be improved)

Next, you will be taken to the identity information screen. This information is used when you use Wally as an identity and login manager (to automatically log in to various websites or provide information at purchase). Wally is extremely focused on privacy! This information will not be shared with any website without your explicit permission, and NO information from this wallet is ever sent to the authors of this app. You can also choose to leave all fields blank. When you are done, press the back arrow (top left).
This completes the setup. If you did not complete any of the steps in this welcome, all fields are available from the app itself. Thank you and enjoy your new wallet!
Buying gift cards gives you access to hundreds of stores that do not directly accept cryptocurrency.
